devdoc.author: Team: Jessica Marshall, Ashoka Finley
devdoc.details: This contract must be initialized with both a TokenRegistry & a ReputationRegistry.

burn(uint256).details: Only to be called by the Token Registry initialized during construction

params._tokens: The number of tokens to burn

constructor.details: Initialize the HyphaToken contract with the address of a TokenRegistry contract & a ReputationRegistry contract

currentPrice().return: The current sell price of 1 token in wei

freezeContract().details: Freezes the hypha token contract and allows existing token holders to withdraw tokens

mint(uint256).details: The required amount of wei must be transferred as the msg.value

params._tokens: The number of tokens requested to be minted

renounceOwnership().details: Allows the current owner to relinquish control of the contract.

returnWei(uint256).details: Only callable by the TokenRegistry initialized during contract construction

params._weiValue: The amount of wei to transfer back to the token contract

sell(uint256).details: Checks that `_tokens` is greater than 0 and that `msg.sender` has sufficient balance. The corresponding amount of wei is transferred to the `msg.sender`

params._tokens: The number of tokens to sell.

transferFromEscrow(address,uint256).details: Only callable by the TokenRegistry initialized during contract construction

params._receipient: address of where the tokens being transferred
params._tokens: The number of tokens to transfer

transferOwnership(address).details: Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.

params._newOwner: The address to transfer ownership to.

transferToEscrow(address,uint256).details: Only callable by the TokenRegistry initialized during contract construction

params._owner: Owner of the tokens being transferred
params._tokens: The number of tokens to transfer

transferTokensTo(address,uint256).details: Only callable by the TokenRegistry initialized during contract construction

params._tokens: The amount of tokens to transfer to the _address

transferWeiTo(address,uint256).details: Only callable by the TokenRegistry or ReputationRegistry initialized during contract construction

params._weiValue: The amount of wei to transfer to the _address

unfreezeContract().details: Unfreezes the hypha token contract and allows existing token holders to withdraw tokens

updateReputationRegistry(address).details: Update the address of the reputation registry

params._newReputationRegistry: Address of the new reputation registry

updateTokenRegistry(address).details: Update the address of the token registry

params._newTokenRegistry: Address of the new token registry

weiRequired(uint256).details: Calulates the target price and multiplies it by the number of tokens desiredA helper function to provide clarity for mint()

params._tokens: The number of tokens requested to be minted

weiRequired(uint256).return: The wei required to purchase the given amount of tokens

devdoc.title: Bonded Curve Implementation of an ERC20 token

burn(uint256).notice: Burn `_tokens` tokens by removing them from the total supply, and from the Token Registry balance.

currentPrice().notice: Returns the current sell price of a token calculated as the contract wei balance divided by the token supply

mint(uint256).notice: Mint `_tokens` tokens, add `_tokens` to the contract totalSupply and add the weiRequired to the contract weiBalance

renounceOwnership().notice: Renouncing to ownership will leave the contract without an owner. It will not be possible to call the functions with the `onlyOwner` modifier anymore.

returnWei(uint256).notice: Return `_weiValue` wei back to Hypha Token contract

sell(uint256).notice: Sell `_tokens` tokens at the current token price.

transferFromEscrow(address,uint256).notice: Transfer `_tokens` tokens from the TokenRegistry escrow to the balance of `_`

transferToEscrow(address,uint256).notice: Transfer `_tokens` tokens from the balance of `_owner` to the TokenRegistry escrow

transferTokensTo(address,uint256).notice: Transfer `_tokens` wei to `_address`       // check where this is used and add that here

transferWeiTo(address,uint256).notice: Transfer `_weiValue` wei to `_address`       // check where this is used and add that here

weiRequired(uint256).notice: Return the wei required to mint `_tokens` tokens

userdoc.notice: This contract implements functionality to be controlled by a TokenRegistry & a ReputationRegistry.
